name: cypress-js-mocha
description: Test framework POC for web ui and api
author: Josphine Job

scripts.test: yarn clean && cp cypress.web.config.js cypress.config.js && yarn cypress run ; yarn generate-report
scripts.open: yarn clean && cp cypress.web.config.js cypress.config.js && yarn cypress open
scripts.api-test: yarn clean && cp cypress.api.config.js cypress.config.js && yarn cypress run ; yarn generate-report
scripts.api-open: yarn clean && cp cypress.api.config.js cypress.config.js && yarn cypress open
scripts.generate-report: npx mochawesome-merge "artifacts/reports/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
